subject: Re: Attention: Eliza Dan,
body:

[image: Picture] *info@zenitthbank.*


Attention: Eliza Dan,

Good Day Madam, This is to let you know that Government of this country has
instructed all paying bank to pay all debt owing to contractors/
inheritance funds hence your own money is among the first ones to be paid
and that will be through our sisterâ€™s bank her e in my bank ZENITH BANK OF
NIGERIA PLC. My name is Mr. EBENEZER ONYEAGWU, I am the new Executive
Director at ZENITH BANK OF NIGERIAA PLC. Moreover, I have only 4 ways of
sending the ATM Visa Card to you. Here is the ways as follows:

1, Bank to Bank transfer into your bank account 3 working days.
2, Through DHL Service: To your doorstep within 2 days.
3, Through FedEx Service: To your doorstep within 3 days.
4, Through UPS Service:  To your doorstep within 3 days.
Regards,
God Bless you Mrs. Eliza Dane,
*MR. EBENEZER ONYEAGWU,*
*EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF ZENITH BANK.*

[image: Picture] *info@zenitthbank.*


Attention: Eliza Dan,

Good day Madam, how are you doing today? I hope all is well with you and
your family and I was very surprised but not disturbed at all because of
the fact That I TRUST myself and I know that I cannot deceive you, Almighty
God is my witness. I would like to bring to your notice that this said
funds in quote is as a result of your long overdue payment and I was
instructed by Nigeria Government to notify you concerning the release of
your fund transfer. This is why you were contacted in the first instance
and you have proved that you are concerned and responded to my message for
further procedures which put you on the right track now to have your funds
finally released to you.

Secondly, regarding all those other impostors contacting you from different
authorities to get information from you will never have contacted you if
you had no funds here. You are advised henceforth to stop any communication
from anyone unless me and my Secretary, unless you do not wish to get the
funds released to you but once you have followed my instruction everything
will go just fine and you will never have to send money to impostors but
send to the right person and will be used for the right cause.

Finally, I strongly advise you to concentrate fully on how to get the
transfer fee needed to proceed with your fund transfer as soon as possible
to avoid any further delay.
Regards,
God Bless you Mrs. Eliza Dane,
*MR. EBENEZER ONYEAGWU,*
*EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF ZENITH BANK.*
